name: Renascent Blood
description:
!CW: Game contains mentions of self-harm + suicide, as well as light blood

Renascent Blood follows the life of Kafara, a young woman who wakes in a strange estate. With a myriad of thoughts clouding her mind, one stands out from the rest.

"I should be dead."

As she meets the other inhabitants of the estate, she is informed of an important fact of life: she's been reborn as a vampire.

Thrust into a new world, she must navigate life with the help of the residents of Marshport Estate, from dealing with budding fangs to spiking bloodlust. Relying on them is her only hope and chance at living.

Will she take this second chance at life?

Despite the initial dark nature of the game, there are lighter scenes befitting Slice of Life, as well as romantic scenes.

Note: The Jam version is limited to a short, unedited version of Idris' Route. So far the choices affect dialogue/scenes, but NOT the ending. The full version of the game will have:

  • All Romance Routes
  • Longer Common Route
  • Lengthier Routes/Epilogue
  • More CGs
  • Meaningful Choices
  • Multiple Endings

Credits:

Writing: Neeka + pastiche

Sprite Art + Logo: YuukiPudding

CG Art: CedarTyan

BGs: Minikle
